DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the excision was confirmed radiographically.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of cutting out; the surgical removal of part or all of a structure or organ._A radiographic procedure using the emission of x-rays to form an image of the structure penetrated by the radiation._Confirmed; having been established or verified.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (ree-SEK-shun) Removal of tissue or part or all of an organ by surgery.

Concepts.definition: The surgical removal of a lesion, often as part of a biopsy and with healthy margins.

Property.preferredDefinition: A radiographic procedure using the emission of x-rays to form an image of the structure penetrated by the radiation.:Confirmed; having been established or verified.

ReferenceDocuments.description: "[IF EXISTS THEN ""true"" ELSE ""false""] PerformedObservation > PerformedClinicalInterpretation.value WHERE PerformedClinicalInterpretation.value = ""confirmed"" AND PerformedObservation > AssessActivityRelationship >  PerformedProcedure > DefinedProcedure.nameCode = ""Perform resection"" AND PerformedObservation > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedClinicalResult > PerformedObservation.methodCode [2] = ""radiography"""
